channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pam Bondi trashed for ‘creepy’ way she keeps addressing Donald Trump to his face
Bolivian court orders the release of a prominent right-wing opposition leader
Trouble in paradise: Kapalua to close 'dying' PGA Tour course for 2 months amid Maui water dispute
F-35 pilot held 50-minute airborne conference call with engineers before fighter jet crashed in Alaska
Denmark summons US envoy after report of Americans carrying out influence operations in Greenland
Trump administration is investing in US rare earths in a push to break China's grip
item.description: The U.S. is ramping up efforts to boost production of crucial components used in electric vehicles, smartphones and fighter jets

item.title: Firefighters try to corral California forest blaze as lightning strikes bring risk of new ignitions
item.description: Firefighting crews are trying to corral a fast-growing blaze churning through central California’s Sierra National Forest, as forecasters warn that li...

item.title: Road rage shooting of pregnant 17-year-old in Louisiana sparks outrage from officials
item.description: Louisiana officials are outraged over a road rage shooting that killed a pregnant 17-year-old and caused her baby to be delivered early

item.title: Judge rejects Cuomo's attempt to make texts in harassment lawsuit public
item.description: Former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo's attempt to continue a legal battle involving an ex-aide's sexual harassment claim has been rejected by a judge

item.title: A Kansas City, Kansas, police officer has died after being struck by a fleeing driver
item.description: A Kansas City, Kansas, police officer has died after a fleeing driver hit tire-deflating devices and veered into him, authorities said
